synopsis:
1st year work 2015, Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation

Director : Mio YAMANAKA
Music : Yoshiki MASUDA
Sound effects : Manami NODA
producer : Taruto FUYAMA

Synopsis : 
"Someday, this will end. I hate it. I wanna live forever," murmurs a girl over and over again. Does she repeat the same moments, or does she move forward? It looks and sounds either way. A wordplay animation.
